message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $125?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $140, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $135.
I'm getting close to your offer, Alice. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130 again?
I'm glad you're still interested, Bob. I can do $137.50, but I think we're getting close to the sweet spot for both of us.
I'm still a bit above my budget, Alice. Would you be willing to meet me at $130 again?
I'm starting to think we're getting stuck, Bob. I can do $135 again, but I'm not sure I'll go any higher.
